intro: Sphaeroma prostrata var. molle, commonly known as the soft sponge crab, is a marine plant that belongs to the family Calagurridae. It is a type of sea anemone that forms a symbiotic relationship with certain species of crabs. The plant has a gelatinous, fleshy body that can change color depending on environmental conditions. It thrives in shallow coastal waters and is often found attached to rocks or coral. Due to its unique structure and ecological role, it plays an important part in marine ecosystems.
